name: Social
description: Twitter inspiread application with functionality including posts, comments, likes and user accounts.
purpose: Purpose of this app was to better understand the process of developing larger scale projects and learn TypeScript.
stack: NextJS, React, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, Firebase, Auth0, CSS Modules.

name: F1 Info
description: Website containing the most valuable information from the world of F1, such as schedule, results and standings.
purpose: Purpose of this app was to learn Server Side Rendering and API calls handling in NextJS.

name: Fruit Shop
description: Self explenatory app with shopping cart functionality, filters and animations.
purpose: Main goal of this app was to learn Redux Toolkit and get familiar with React Router and Framer Motion.
stack: React, React Router, Redux Tookit, Framer Motion, CSS Modules.
